<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataAZ extends data { const CODE = 'AZ'; const PREFIX = 994; const REGION = 'Asia'; const PATTERNS = array( '365\d{6}|(?:[124579]\d|60|88)\d{7}', ); const TYPES = array( '365(?:[0-46-9]\d|5[0-35-9])\d{4}|(?:1[28]\d|2(?:[045]2|1[24]|2[2-4]|33|6[23]))\d{6}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '(?:36554|99[2-9]\d\d)\d{4}|(?:4[04]|5[015]|60|7[07])\d{7}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '88\d{7}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), '900200\d{3}'=>array( 'premium_rate', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{3})(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{3})(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3 $4', '(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3 $4', ); }
